text: Ice Drake channels its freezing essence into ground producing razor sharp spikes around himself.
Riders ride with the wind, and that wind will strike at the enemy even before they do, throwing them around like a hurricane.
Icy spears of unseelie can be used to freeze enemy to the ground.
Unseelie form tight formation, concentrating  magic of their armour and forming whirlwind that protects against arrows.
Snow constructs are magical golems, soulless automatons under command of the frost mage.
Snow constructs do not just hold together by themselves, some magic is needed and if magic dissipates so will they.
